titleStmt.title: Observations on the 22. stanza in the 9th. canto of the 2d. book of Spencers Faery Queen Full of excellent notions concerning the frame of man, and his rationall soul. Written by the right noble and illustrious knight Sir Kenelme Digby, at the request of a friend.
titleStmt.author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Daniel Frere bookseller, at the Red-Bull in Little Brittain,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Observations on the 22. stanza of the Faery Queen.
Imperfect as filmed; lacks text in inner margin.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
